m_szDocTitle: Chile to consider public-private partnerships to develop lithium | Reuters
m_szDocSumamry: Chile to consider public-private partnerships to develop lithium SANTIAGO SANTIAGO Jan 27 World No. 1 copper producer Chile will consider boosting the development of its lithium industry through public-private partnerships, though the state would retain control of the mineral, a government-funded commission said on Tuesday. With one of the largest lithium reserves on the globe, Chile is already the second-biggest producer of the mineral, which is widely used in products ranging from hybrid vehicles to smartphone batteries.
